sqlMap.select: select * ,(select code FROM sys_corporation d where t.agenid=d.id)AS agencode FROM fina_agenbill_dtl t WHERE $qry$ ORDER BY t.nos desc
select count(*) AS counts FROM fina_agenbill_dtl t WHERE $qry$

SELECT * ,(SELECT COALESCE(x.code,'') ||'/'|| COALESCE(x.abbr,'') FROM sys_corporation x WHERE x.id = t.corpid) AS corper ,COALESCE((SELECT SUM(COALESCE(amtreq,0)) FROM fina_rpreqdtl x , fina_rpreq y WHERE x.arapid = t.id AND x.isdelete = FALSE AND x.rpreqid = y.id AND y.reqtype = 'S' AND y.isdelete = FALSE),0) AS amtrpreq1 ,f_amtto_glp(b.signdate,t.currency,t.amount) AS amounto ,f_fs_getxrate(b.signdate::DATE , t.currency) AS xrate ,b.cyidto FROM _fina_arap t , fina_agenbill b WHERE $qry$ AND t.agenbillid = b.id AND t.isdelete = FALSE AND t.rptype !='H' ORDER BY jobno,araptype , customerid , feeitemid , currency
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM _fina_arap t WHERE $qry$ AND t.isdelete = FALSE AND t.rptype !='H'
SELECT * FROM _fina_arap t WHERE $qry$ AND t.isdelete = FALSE AND t.rptype !='O' ORDER BY araptype , customerid , feeitemid , currency
SELECT COUNT(*) AS counts FROM _fina_arap t WHERE $qry$ AND t.isdelete = FALSE AND t.rptype !='O'
